Objectifs du module: Business models are increasingly the key determinant of successful innovation projects, and innovation in business modeling is increasingly the differentiating (or disrupting) dimension of any successful new project or business. Understanding the business model as a complex adaptive system with interdependencies and implicit tradeoffs, practicing and applying both a traditional and dynamic business modeling process hands-on, and learning how to integrate new approaches like circular economy, new technology, and lean startup will be addressed in this highly interactive two-day workshop. Learning objectives: • Understand the concept of business models in all its complexity and interdependency • Comprehend and analyze existing and emerging business models • Apply dynamic business modeling to develop and design new business models • Integrate new technologies, circular economy and lean startup principles into existing or novel business models • Design innovative energy business models • Present a business model as part of a project finance request or business plan
Programme du module: Course syllabus: • Introduction to business models • Business models as complex adaptive systems • Dynamic business modeling • Business modeling and the integration of new technologies • Circular Economy Business Models • New energy business models and the innovative mindset • From dynamic business modeling to business plan
Contr\u00f4le des connaissances - R\u00e: Assessment: Participation 15% (based on active participation in group discussions) Group work 35% (group presentation of a new or redesigned business model) Final individual assignment 50% (individual design of a new business model using the dynamic business modeling framework)
